nodes.name: Profitability and Growth Signals
nodes.question: Is the company showing strong signs of profitability?

nodes.name: FIN1
nodes.question: Company demonstrates consistent, high revenue growth.

nodes.name: FIN2
nodes.question: Company maintains a high net profit margin for its industry.

nodes.name: FIN3
nodes.question: Company holds a dominant or rapidly growing market share.

nodes.name: Solvency and Stability
nodes.question: Is the company financially stable?

nodes.name: FIN4
nodes.question: Debt-to-Equity ratio is below the industry average.

nodes.name: FIN5
nodes.question: Company generates strong and positive free cash flow.

nodes.name: ENV1
nodes.question: Carbon emissions (Scopes 1&2) are verifiably below the industry average.

nodes.name: ENV2
nodes.question: Waste and water usage are minimal and well-managed.

nodes.name: ENV3
nodes.question: Supply chain has strong, audited environmental standards.

nodes.name: ENV4
nodes.question: Company commits a high percentage of R&D to validated green technology.

nodes.name: ENV5
nodes.question: Has ambitious, science-based emission reduction targets (e.g., SBTi certified).

nodes.name: ENV6
nodes.question: Executive compensation is directly and significantly linked to achieving environmental targets.

nodes.name: SOC1
nodes.question: Pays a verified living wage to all global employees.

nodes.name: SOC2
nodes.question: Employee turnover rate is exceptionally low for the industry.

nodes.name: SOC3
nodes.question: Has strong, independently verified diversity & inclusion metrics.

nodes.name: SOC4
nodes.question: Supply chain is robustly and transparently audited for labor rights (no forced/child labor).

nodes.name: SOC5
nodes.question: Products and services provide a clear, net positive social good.

nodes.name: SOC6
nodes.question: Company has a clean record on product safety and consumer protection.

nodes.name: SOC7
nodes.question: No major, unresolved human rights controversies in its operations or supply chain.

nodes.name: GOV1
nodes.question: The board of directors is majority independent and diverse.

nodes.name: GOV2
nodes.question: Executive pay ratio is reasonable and linked to long-term, sustainable value.

nodes.name: GOV3
nodes.question: Political lobbying and donations are transparent and align with stated company values.

nodes.name: GOV4
nodes.question: Has strong shareholder protection rights (e.g., no dual-class shares).

nodes.name: GOV5
nodes.question: Tax practices are transparent and fair (no excessive use of tax havens).
